parameters.name: UseTracking
parameters.description: Should each predator follow a  prey around?

parameters.name: numtojump
parameters.description: Number of updates after a bug gets eaten before an interruption can happen

parameters.name: Drift
parameters.description: Number of degrees off you might get on each update.

parameters.name: Rate
parameters.description: How many pixels you can travel per time step (ms.) this should be adjusted so it does not depend on refresh rate

parameters.name: minwait
parameters.description: Minimum time in ms before an interruption

parameters.name: maxwait
parameters.description: Maximum time in ms before an interruption.

parameters.name: sa2cue
parameters.description: Should the locations of the targets in SA2 be cued?
